name: Keyboard Platformer game
description:
This game is from my second Quarter exam from my third year of university.
It went through a few design iterations focusing on an arcade styled game, a focus on emergent gameplay and lastly polishing and level design before the exam build.

I enjoyed how this game had changed through development and was happy with the final product to put it online with the different versions. 

Arcade - The arcade version is self controlling, you only need to make the ground by holding keys on your keyboard.
Final - This version contains a tutorial and is more of a full game passed the Arcade version.
